text:
Once again, it's anonymous gov't #whistleblowers & intrepid investigative journalists (thanks @KatherineEban!)  to the rescue - sounding alarm re: potentially dangerous #chloroquine drugs in Strategic Nat'l Stockpile. 

Amidst #COVID19 chaos, clear-eyed #whistleblowers are vital. https://t.co/WZomYTjc1R
